sentence.Network_en: It's not just mindless entertainment, it's a film with a message.
sentence.Network_cn: 它并不是一部没有意思的娱乐片, 而是一部有寓意的影片.

sentence.Network_en: A moment of mindless violence snuffed out his life.
sentence.Network_cn: 一时无谓的暴力结束了他的生命.

二. 无心（Mindless）的信仰？　　这种把心（Heart，或者灵Spirit）和心智（Mind）分割开的二分法，是违反圣经的真理，也违反人格 …

list.abs: mindless violence ; reasonless hostility ; a senseless act ., 不理智的暴行 ; 不理智的敌对 ; 不理智的行为.
Werewolves are mindless beasts in wolf form . False ., 当变身成狼的时候 , 狼人是没脑子的野兽 . 错.
Doing this mindless work all day is going to drive me crazy ., 整天做这种不用心的工作 , 会使我发疯.
there will always be an audience for mindless crap , but not only for mindless crap .总有观众喜欢垃圾片，但观众看电影不只是为了垃圾片！

entry.def: If you describe a violent action as mindless, you mean that it is done without thought and will achieve nothing.

example.ex: ...a plot that mixes blackmail, extortion and mindless violence.
example.tran: 集合了敲诈勒索和盲目暴力的故事情节

entry.tran: 愚蠢的;无知的;不动脑子的
entry.def: If you describe a person or group as mindless, you mean that they are stupid or do not think about what they are doing.

example.ex: She wasn't at all the mindless little wife so many people perceived her to be.
example.tran: 她绝对不是许多人认为的那种愚蠢的小媳妇。

entry.tran: 单调乏味的;无需动脑筋的
entry.def: If you describe an activity as mindless, you mean that it is so dull that people do it or take part in it without thinking.

example.tran: 一些工作中的机械重复

means.word_mean: 1. lacking the thinking capacity characteristic of a conscious being;

sentences.sentence: "while thus unmindful of his steps he stumbled"- G.B.Shaw

means.word_mean: 5. not marked by the use of reason;
